verses.english: I was glad when they said unto me, Let us go into the house of the LORD.

strongs_def: a song; abstractly, singing
gloss: musical(-ick), [idiom] sing(-er, -ing), song.

strongs_def: elevation, i.e. the act (literally, a journey to a higher place, figuratively, a thought arising), or (concretely) the condition (literally, a step or grademark, figuratively, a superiority of station); specifically a climactic progression (in certain Psalms)
gloss: things that come up, (high) degree, deal, go up, stair, step, story.

derivation: rarely (fully); דָּוִיד; from the same as H1730 (דּוֹד); loving;
strongs_def: David, the youngest son of Jesse
gloss: David.

strongs_def: probably to brighten up, i.e. (figuratively) be (causatively, make) blithe or gleesome
gloss: cheer up, be (make) glad, (have, make) joy(-ful), be (make) merry, (cause to, make to) rejoice, [idiom] very.

strongs_def: to say (used with great latitude)
gloss: answer, appoint, avouch, bid, boast self, call, certify, challenge, charge, [phrase] (at the, give) command(-ment), commune, consider, declare, demand, [idiom] desire, determine, [idiom] expressly, [idiom] indeed, [idiom] intend, name, [idiom] plainly, promise, publish, report, require, say, speak (against, of), [idiom] still, [idiom] suppose, talk, tell, term, [idiom] that is, [idiom] think, use (speech), utter, [idiom] verily, [idiom] yet.

strongs_def: a house (in the greatest variation of applications, especially family, etc.)
gloss: court, daughter, door, [phrase] dungeon, family, [phrase] forth of, [idiom] great as would contain, hangings, home(born), (winter) house(-hold), inside(-ward), palace, place, [phrase] prison, [phrase] steward, [phrase] tablet, temple, web, [phrase] within(-out).

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: to walk (literally or figuratively); causatively, to carry (in various senses)
gloss: [idiom] again, away, bear, bring, carry (away), come (away), depart, flow, [phrase] follow(-ing), get (away, hence, him), (cause to, made) go (away, -ing, -ne, one's way, out), grow, lead (forth), let down, march, prosper, [phrase] pursue, cause to run, spread, take away (-journey), vanish, (cause to) walk(-ing), wax, [idiom] be weak.

verses.header: ¶ A Song of degrees of David.

verses.english: Our feet shall stand within thy gates, O Jerusalem.

strongs_def: to stand, in various relations (literal and figurative, intransitive and transitive)
gloss: abide (behind), appoint, arise, cease, confirm, continue, dwell, be employed, endure, establish, leave, make, ordain, be (over), place, (be) present (self), raise up, remain, repair, [phrase] serve, set (forth, over, -tle, up), (make to, make to be at a, with-) stand (by, fast, firm, still, up), (be at a) stay (up), tarry.

strongs_def: to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
gloss: beacon, [idiom] altogether, be(-come), accomplished, committed, like), break, cause, come (to pass), do, faint, fall, [phrase] follow, happen, [idiom] have, last, pertain, quit (one-) self, require, [idiom] use.

strongs_def: a foot (as used in walking); by implication, a step; by euphemistically the pudenda
gloss: [idiom] be able to endure, [idiom] according as, [idiom] after, [idiom] coming, [idiom] follow, (broken-)foot(-ed, -stool), [idiom] great toe, [idiom] haunt, [idiom] journey, leg, [phrase] piss, [phrase] possession, time.

derivation: from H8176 (שָׁעַר) in its original sense;
strongs_def: an opening, i.e. door or gate
gloss: city, door, gate, port ([idiom] -er).

derivation: rarely יְרוּשָׁלַיִם; a dual (in allusion to its two main hills (the true pointing, at least of the former reading, seems to be that of H3390 (יְרוּשָׁלֵם))); probably from (the passive participle of) H3384 (יָרָה) and H7999 (שָׁלַם); founded peaceful;
strongs_def: Jerushalaim or Jerushalem, the capital city of Palestine
gloss: Jerusalem.

verses.english: Jerusalem is builded as a city that is compact together:

derivation: rarely יְרוּשָׁלַיִם; a dual (in allusion to its two main hills (the true pointing, at least of the former reading, seems to be that of H3390 (יְרוּשָׁלֵם))); probably from (the passive participle of) H3384 (יָרָה) and H7999 (שָׁלַם); founded peaceful;
strongs_def: Jerushalaim or Jerushalem, the capital city of Palestine
gloss: Jerusalem.

strongs_def: to build (literally and figuratively)
gloss: (begin to) build(-er), obtain children, make, repair, set (up), [idiom] surely.

derivation: or (in the plural) עָר; or עָיַר; (Judges 10:4), from H5782 (עוּר)
strongs_def: a city (a place guarded by waking or a watch) in the widest sense (even of a mere encampment or post)
gloss: Ai (from margin), city, court (from margin), town.

strongs_def: to join (literally or figuratively); specifically (by means of spells) to fascinate
gloss: charm(-er), be compact, couple (together), have fellowship with, heap up, join (self, together), league.

strongs_def: properly, a unit, i.e. (adverb) unitedly
gloss: alike, at all (once), both, likewise, only, (al-) together, withal.

verses.english: Whither the tribes go up, the tribes of the LORD, unto the testimony of Israel, to give thanks unto the name of the LORD.

derivation: a primitive particle (rather from the relative pronoun, H834 (אֲשֶׁר));
strongs_def: there (transferring to time) then; often thither, or thence
gloss: in it, [phrase] thence, there (-in, [phrase] of, [phrase] out), [phrase] thither, [phrase] whither.

strongs_def: to ascend, intransitively (be high) or actively (mount); used in a great variety of senses, primary and secondary, literal and figurative
gloss: arise (up), (cause to) ascend up, at once, break (the day) (up), bring (up), (cause to) burn, carry up, cast up, [phrase] shew, climb (up), (cause to, make to) come (up), cut off, dawn, depart, exalt, excel, fall, fetch up, get up, (make to) go (away, up); grow (over) increase, lay, leap, levy, lift (self) up, light, (make) up, [idiom] mention, mount up, offer, make to pay, [phrase] perfect, prefer, put (on), raise, recover, restore, (make to) rise (up), scale, set (up), shoot forth (up), (begin to) spring (up), stir up, take away (up), work.

derivation: from an unused root probably meaning to branch off;
strongs_def: a scion, i.e. (literally) a stick (for punishing, writing, fighting, ruling, walking, etc.) or (figuratively) a clan
gloss: [idiom] correction, dart, rod, sceptre, staff, tribe.

derivation: from an unused root probably meaning to branch off;
strongs_def: a scion, i.e. (literally) a stick (for punishing, writing, fighting, ruling, walking, etc.) or (figuratively) a clan
gloss: [idiom] correction, dart, rod, sceptre, staff, tribe.

derivation: contraction for H3068 (יְהֹוָה), and meaning the same;
strongs_def: Jah, the sacred name
gloss: Jah, the Lord, most vehement. Compare names in '-iah,' '-jah.'

strongs_def: testimony
gloss: testimony, witness.

derivation: from H8280 (שָׂרָה) and H410 (אֵל); he will rule as God;
strongs_def: Jisrael, a symbolical name of Jacob; also (typically) of his posterity
gloss: Israel.

derivation: a primitive root; used only as denominative from H3027 (יָד); literally, to use (i.e. hold out) the hand;
strongs_def: physically, to throw (a stone, an arrow) at or away; especially to revere or worship (with extended hands); intensively, to bemoan (by wringing the hands)
gloss: cast (out), (make) confess(-ion), praise, shoot, (give) thank(-ful, -s, -sgiving).

derivation: a primitive word (perhaps rather from through the idea of definite and conspicuous position; compare H8064 (שָׁמַיִם));
strongs_def: an appellation, as amark or memorial of individuality; by implication honor, authority, character
gloss: [phrase] base, (in-) fame(-ous), named(-d), renown, report.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

verses.english: For there are set thrones of judgment, the thrones of the house of David.

derivation: a primitive particle (the full form of the prepositional prefix) indicating causal relations of all kinds, antecedent or consequent;
strongs_def: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
gloss: and, + (forasmuch, inasmuch, where-) as, assured(-ly), + but, certainly, doubtless, + else, even, + except, for, how, (because, in, so, than) that, + nevertheless, now, rightly, seeing, since, surely, then, therefore, + (al-) though, + till, truly, + until, when, whether, while, whom, yea, yet.

derivation: a primitive particle (rather from the relative pronoun, H834 (אֲשֶׁר));
strongs_def: there (transferring to time) then; often thither, or thence
gloss: in it, [phrase] thence, there (-in, [phrase] of, [phrase] out), [phrase] thither, [phrase] whither.

strongs_def: properly, to sit down (specifically as judge. in ambush, in quiet); by implication, to dwell, to remain; causatively, to settle, to marry
gloss: (make to) abide(-ing), continue, (cause to, make to) dwell(-ing), ease self, endure, establish, [idiom] fail, habitation, haunt, (make to) inhabit(-ant), make to keep (house), lurking, [idiom] marry(-ing), (bring again to) place, remain, return, seat, set(-tle), (down-) sit(-down, still, -ting down, -ting (place) -uate), take, tarry.

strongs_def: properly, covered, i.e. a throne (as canopied)
gloss: seat, stool, throne.

strongs_def: properly, a verdict (favorable or unfavorable) pronounced judicially, especially a sentence or formal decree (human or (participant's) divine law, individual or collective), including the act, the place, the suit, the crime, and the penalty; abstractly, justice, including a participant's right or privilege (statutory or customary), or even a style
gloss: [phrase] adversary, ceremony, charge, [idiom] crime, custom, desert, determination, discretion, disposing, due, fashion, form, to be judged, judgment, just(-ice, -ly), (manner of) law(-ful), manner, measure, (due) order, ordinance, right, sentence, usest, [idiom] worthy, [phrase] wrong.

strongs_def: properly, covered, i.e. a throne (as canopied)
gloss: seat, stool, throne.

strongs_def: a house (in the greatest variation of applications, especially family, etc.)
gloss: court, daughter, door, [phrase] dungeon, family, [phrase] forth of, [idiom] great as would contain, hangings, home(born), (winter) house(-hold), inside(-ward), palace, place, [phrase] prison, [phrase] steward, [phrase] tablet, temple, web, [phrase] within(-out).

derivation: rarely (fully); דָּוִיד; from the same as H1730 (דּוֹד); loving;
strongs_def: David, the youngest son of Jesse
gloss: David.

verses.english: Pray for the peace of Jerusalem: they shall prosper that love thee.

strongs_def: to inquire; by implication, to request; by extension, to demand
gloss: ask (counsel, on), beg, borrow, lay to charge, consult, demand, desire, [idiom] earnestly, enquire, [phrase] greet, obtain leave, lend, pray, request, require, [phrase] salute, [idiom] straitly, [idiom] surely, wish.

strongs_def: safe, i.e. (figuratively) well, happy, friendly; also (abstractly) welfare, i.e. health, prosperity, peace
gloss: [idiom] do, familiar, [idiom] fare, favour, [phrase] friend, [idiom] great, (good) health, ([idiom] perfect, such as be at) peace(-able, -ably), prosper(-ity, -ous), rest, safe(-ty), salute, welfare, ([idiom] all is, be) well, [idiom] wholly.

derivation: rarely יְרוּשָׁלַיִם; a dual (in allusion to its two main hills (the true pointing, at least of the former reading, seems to be that of H3390 (יְרוּשָׁלֵם))); probably from (the passive participle of) H3384 (יָרָה) and H7999 (שָׁלַם); founded peaceful;
strongs_def: Jerushalaim or Jerushalem, the capital city of Palestine
gloss: Jerusalem.

strongs_def: to be tranquil, i.e. secure or successful
gloss: be happy, prosper, be in safety.

strongs_def: to have affection for (sexually or otherwise)
gloss: (be-) love(-d, -ly, -r), like, friend.

verses.english: Peace be within thy walls, and prosperity within thy palaces.

strongs_def: to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
gloss: beacon, [idiom] altogether, be(-come), accomplished, committed, like), break, cause, come (to pass), do, faint, fall, [phrase] follow, happen, [idiom] have, last, pertain, quit (one-) self, require, [idiom] use.

strongs_def: safe, i.e. (figuratively) well, happy, friendly; also (abstractly) welfare, i.e. health, prosperity, peace
gloss: [idiom] do, familiar, [idiom] fare, favour, [phrase] friend, [idiom] great, (good) health, ([idiom] perfect, such as be at) peace(-able, -ably), prosper(-ity, -ous), rest, safe(-ty), salute, welfare, ([idiom] all is, be) well, [idiom] wholly.

derivation: or (shortened) חֵל; a collateral form of H2428 (חַיִל);
strongs_def: an army; also (by analogy,) an intrenchment
gloss: army, bulwark, host, [phrase] poor, rampart, trench, wall.

strongs_def: security (genuine or false)
gloss: abundance, peace(-ably), prosperity, quietness.

derivation: from an unused root (meaning to be elevated);
strongs_def: a citadel (from its height)
gloss: castle, palace. Compare H2038 (הַרְמוֹן).

verses.english: For my brethren and companions' sakes, I will now say, Peace be within thee.

strongs_def: properly, heed, i.e. purpose; used only adverbially, on account of (as a motive or an aim), teleologically, in order that
gloss: because of, to the end (intent) that, for (to,... 's sake), [phrase] lest, that, to.

strongs_def: a brother (used in the widest sense of literal relationship and metaphorical affinity or resemblance (like father))
gloss: another, brother(-ly); kindred, like, other. Compare also the proper names beginning with 'Ah-' or 'Ahi-'.

strongs_def: an associate (more or less close)
gloss: brother, companion, fellow, friend, husband, lover, neighbour, [idiom] (an-) other.

strongs_def: perhaps properly, to arrange; but used figuratively (of words), to speak; rarely (in a destructive sense) to subdue
gloss: answer, appoint, bid, command, commune, declare, destroy, give, name, promise, pronounce, rehearse, say, speak, be spokesman, subdue, talk, teach, tell, think, use (entreaties), utter, [idiom] well, [idiom] work.

derivation: a primitive particle of incitement and entreaty, which may usually be rendered;
strongs_def: 'I pray', 'now', or 'then'; added mostly to verbs (in the Imperative or Future), or to interjections, occasionally to an adverb or conjunction
gloss: I beseech (pray) thee (you), go to, now, oh.

strongs_def: safe, i.e. (figuratively) well, happy, friendly; also (abstractly) welfare, i.e. health, prosperity, peace
gloss: [idiom] do, familiar, [idiom] fare, favour, [phrase] friend, [idiom] great, (good) health, ([idiom] perfect, such as be at) peace(-able, -ably), prosper(-ity, -ous), rest, safe(-ty), salute, welfare, ([idiom] all is, be) well, [idiom] wholly.

verses.english: Because of the house of the LORD our God I will seek thy good.

strongs_def: properly, heed, i.e. purpose; used only adverbially, on account of (as a motive or an aim), teleologically, in order that
gloss: because of, to the end (intent) that, for (to,... 's sake), [phrase] lest, that, to.

strongs_def: a house (in the greatest variation of applications, especially family, etc.)
gloss: court, daughter, door, [phrase] dungeon, family, [phrase] forth of, [idiom] great as would contain, hangings, home(born), (winter) house(-hold), inside(-ward), palace, place, [phrase] prison, [phrase] steward, [phrase] tablet, temple, web, [phrase] within(-out).

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

strongs_def: to search out (by any method, specifically in worship or prayer); by implication, to strive after
gloss: ask, beg, beseech, desire, enquire, get, make inquisition, procure, (make) request, require, seek (for).

strongs_def: good (as an adjective) in the widest sense; used likewise as a noun, both in the masculine and the feminine, the singular and the plural (good, a good or good thing, a good man or woman; the good, goods or good things, good men or women), also as an adverb (well)
gloss: beautiful, best, better, bountiful, cheerful, at ease, [idiom] fair (word), (be in) favour, fine, glad, good (deed, -lier, -liest, -ly, -ness, -s), graciously, joyful, kindly, kindness, liketh (best), loving, merry, [idiom] most, pleasant, [phrase] pleaseth, pleasure, precious, prosperity, ready, sweet, wealth, welfare, (be) well(-favoured).
